name: Sourdough Torillas
steps: Add ingredients until combined to form dough
Cover with a damp towel or airtight lid and rest for 30 min
Flour the surface for rolling the dough and divide into 8-10 pieces.
Roll with rolling pin until about 1/4 in thick
cook on high heat for about 1 min on each side. Flip as soon as bubbles appear
Cool and then store in an airtight container
